name: NINJA X-MAS
description:
USE YOUR MOUSE ONLY! Hello everyone this is Outrage Games! This game is made for Christmas! I created it only in 1 week! I wanted to test myself and see if I can complete a project properly only in a short period of time. And I think I achieved it! 10 levels of fun! I hope you enjoy it! Happy new year everyone!
